Obstacles to adaptation can include scientific uncertainty, the lack of long-term planning, and not explicitly considering #climate change.

#Climate adaptation can also include measures to alter human behaviour, e.g. water management & economic diversification ('soft' actions)
#Climate change adaptation can also make use of nature, e.g. reinforcing wetlands and enhancing plant and animal migration (‘green’ actions)
Adaptation to #climate change can include technological and engineering solutions, e.g. coastal and river flood defences (‘grey’ actions)
